/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/c++   -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX10.14.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names   -I/usr/local/lib -framework Cocoa -framework IOKit -framework CoreVideo -framework OpenGL -lglfw CMakeFiles/myLearnOpenGL.dir/main.cc.o CMakeFiles/myLearnOpenGL.dir/glad/src/glad.c.o  -o myLearnOpenGL   -L/usr/local/Cellar/glfw/3.3.2/lib  -L/Users/muqing/myLearnOpenGL/./glad/glad
